name: Blinded Fear
description:
---Controls---

Move camera: Touch the side of the screen to move

Fire: Left Click

--- Story ---

The city is under attack of multiple giant monsters. You need to defend it with your dual canons.

--- Dev Info ---

This game was made for the No Image GameJam. Only Built-in editor and procedural textures are allowed. This game was made with some URP Shader Graph.
